chapters.title: Chapter 32: Sealed to the Flame
chapters.info: Josaine, p. 509 (652)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She found an angreal and did not bring it to the Tower as Aes Sedai are supposed to, instead keeping it in her room. Alviarin found out about it, and told Elaida she needed to make an example of her while Elaida was feeling weak.
